original_text: And ye shall know that I am the Lord, when I have opened your graves, O my people, and brought you up out of your graves,
korean_text: 내 백성들아 내가 너희 무덤을 열고 너희로 거기에서 나오게 한즉 너희는 내가 여호와인 줄을 알리라

sentences.original_text: And ye shall know that I am the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하면 너희가 나 여호와인 줄 알리라

sentences.original_text: when I have opened your graves
and brought you up out of your graves
